name: Underground Arachnid
text:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner
If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell or Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn, you can select 1 monster your opponent controls, and equip it to this card. If this card would be destroyed, you can send the monster equipped to this card to the Graveyard instead.
